update.description:
depends on the following pull requests:

* [ign-rendering pull request #252](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/252/add-support-for-setting-visibility-mask/diff)
* [ign-sensors pull request #115](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/115)
* [sdformat pull request #673](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/673) \(added to sdf spec 1.7\)

The changes let users use visibility mask and flags to alter the visibility of visuals for each camera. A visual is visible to a camera if `(visibility flags & visibility mask) > 0`

The user can also set the gui camera’s visibility mask through scene3d plugin params

Screenshot from `visibility.sdf`:

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1992579224-visibility.png)
‌

note to self: bump dependency when a new sdformat minor version is released
update.title: Add support for visual visibility flags and camera visibility mask

pullrequest.title: Add support for visual visibility flags and camera visibility mask

content.raw:
Meanwhile, it looks like we also need a rendering release:

```
/Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/ign-gazebo/src/rendering/SceneManager.cc:301:14: error: no member named 'SetVisibilityFlags' in 'ignition::rendering::v4::Visual'
  visualVis->SetVisibilityFlags(_visual.VisibilityFlags());
  ~~~~~~~~~  ^
```
content.html:
Meanwhile, it looks like we also need a rendering release:

/Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/ign-gazebo/src/rendering/SceneManager.cc:301:14: error: no member named 'SetVisibilityFlags' in 'ignition::rendering::v4::Visual'
  visualVis->SetVisibilityFlags(_visual.VisibilityFlags());
  ~~~~~~~~~  ^

pull_request.title: Add support for visual visibility flags and camera visibility mask

pullrequest.title: Add support for visual visibility flags and camera visibility mask

content.raw:
I think the homebrew release wasn't ready yet. Triggered a new one: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/2816/badge/icon)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/2816/)

Also worth noting that even though this will compile against the current `ign-sensors` version, the new functionality won't work until the `ign-sensors` PR is released.
content.html:
I think the homebrew release wasn't ready yet. Triggered a new one:

Also worth noting that even though this will compile against the current ign-sensors version, the new functionality won't work until the ign-sensors PR is released.

content.raw: Just wondering if this \(convert string to integer, whether it is written as hex or as number, or even in binary 0bxxxx\) is a generic enough feature that we can make it a function in ign-common/Utils? No strong feelings here since didn’t see any case of it being done in other places.
content.html: Just wondering if this (convert string to integer, whether it is written as hex or as number, or even in binary 0bxxxx) is a generic enough feature that we can make it a function in ign-common/Utils? No strong feelings here since didn’t see any case of it being done in other places.
